ETYMOLOGY: From Latin alumna (feminine of alumnus 'foster child, pupil'), from alere 'to nourish'.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: Noun: a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things (common noun), or to name a particular one of these (proper noun).
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A female former student of a school, college, or university.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: （某学校、学院或大学的）女校友；女毕业生。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: She is a proud alumna of this prestigious institution.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 她是这所著名学府的骄傲女校友。
